description.value:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.qMa2fIP2nqrFzHrq]{Scout Dedication}

You meander around unpredictably, and then ambush your opponents without warning.

Choose one enemy. @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Stride}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} against that opponent, and then make a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} against that foe. For your Feint, you can attempt a Stealth check instead of the Deception check that’s usually required, because you use the terrain around you to catch your foe off-guard.
